mapper.insert: insert into GREENPOINT (GREENPOINTID, GREENPOINTVALUE, GREENPOINTTYPE, GREENPOINTDATE,USERID,COMPID) VALUES (#{greenPointId}, #{greenPointValue}, #{greenPointType}, SYSDATE, #{userId} , #{compId})
mapper.select: select GREENPOINTID, GREENPOINTVALUE, GREENPOINTTYPE, GREENPOINTDATE,USERID,COMPID from GREENPOINT where USERID = #{id}
